settings.title: Izilungiselelo
settings.logoutDescription: Uzoqujiswa ekhasini lokuqala futhi uzodinga ukungena futhi ukuze ufinyelele i-akhawunti yakho.

hero.title: Inshurensi Ehlakaniphile Yabalimi BaseNingizimu Afrika
hero.subtitle: Vikela izitshalo nezifuyo zakho ngesivikelo esiholwa yi-AI. Thola izinkokhelo ngokushesha lapho isimo sezulu sihlasela.

smartProtection.title: Ukuvikelwa Kwezitshalo Okuhlakaniphile
smartProtection.description: I-AI iqapha amaphethini esimo sezulu futhi iphinda iziqalise ngokuzenzakalela izinkokhelo lapho imikhawulo ifinyelelwa.

mobileClaims.title: Izimangalo Zefoni Kuqala
mobileClaims.description: Faka izimangalo ngokushesha nge-app yethu noma i-USSD. Ayikho imibhalo, alukho ukulinda.

instantPayouts.title: Izinkokhelo Ngokushesha
instantPayouts.description: Thola inhlawulo ngaphakathi namahora angama-48 ngokuya ngqo esikhwameni sakho semali yefoni.

community.title: Umphakathi Wabalimi
community.description: Xhuma nabanye abalimi, yabelana ngolwazi, futhi ufinyelele izinsiza zezolimo.

trust.title: Kuthenjelwa Abalimi Abangaphezu kuka-10,000+
trust.subtitle: Joyina amakhulu abalimi aseNingizimu Afrika abavikela ukuphila kwabo nge-InsurAgri.

cta.title: Qala Namuhla
cta.subtitle: Vikela ipulazi lakho nge-inshurensi ehlakaniphile eyenzelwe ezolimo zaseNingizimu Afrika.

learn.title: Isikhungo Sokufunda
learn.subtitle: Finyelela imihlahlandlela yokulima, izinqubo ezihle kakhulu, nolwazi lwezolimo ukuthuthukisa impumelelo yakho yokulima.

featuredContent.title: Amasu Okulungiselela Isomiso
featuredContent.description: Amasu abalulekile okulungiselela ipulazi lakho isikhathi esomile

emailVerification.title: Ukuqinisekiswa Kwe-imeyili Kuyadingeka
emailVerification.message: Sicela uqinisekise ikheli lakho le-imeyili ngaphambi kokuqedela ukubhalisa kwakho.
emailVerification.error: Kwehlulekile ukuthumela i-imeyili yokuqinisekisa. Sicela uzame futhi.

register.success: Ukubhalisa kuphumelele! Sicela uhlole i-imeyili yakho ukuze uqinisekise i-akhawunti yakho.
register.emailExists: I-akhawunti enale imeyili isivele ikhona. Sicela usebenzise imeyili ehlukile noma uzame ukungena.
